none.$description: (0px). Use when elements should have no gap or padding between them (e.g both consecutive sections have white bg, so the next section will have a 0px top padding to avoid an excessive spacing).

2xs.$description: (4px). Use for very tight spacing like icon-to-text gaps or subtle padding.

xs.$description: (8px). Use for compact component internal spacing or small gaps between related elements.

sm.$description: (12px). Use for moderate padding within components or gaps between closely related items.

md.$description: (16px). Default spacing for most component padding and gaps. Our baseline spacing unit.

lg.$description: (24px). Use for generous component padding or gaps between distinct sections.

xl.$description: (32px). Use for significant separation between components or section padding.

2xl.$description: (40px). Use for separation between content blocks within a section.

3xl.$description: (48px). Use for vertical separation between sections.

4xl.$description: (64px). Use for maximum spacing between distinct page areas or special layout needs.

square.$description: Sharp corners with no rounding (0px). Use for rectangular elements requiring hard edges.

sm.$description: Small corner radius (6px). Use for subtle rounding on cards and other UI elements.

md.$description: Medium corner radius (8px). Standard rounding for most components like inputs, bigger cards, and containers.

xl.$description: Use it only for Search Typeahead menus and pill shaped items (e.g Quantity Stepper).

2xl.$description: Use it for pill-shaped elements like buttons and chips.

full.$description: Creates fully rounded borders (pill-shaped buttons, circular avatars). Outputs as 50% in CSS. The 1000px Figma value is a placeholderâ€”actual roundness is percentage-based.

xs.$description: (24px). Use as the base icon height and smaller elements.

sm.$description: (32px). Use it as the fixed height for Small Buttons and sm variants.

md.$description: (40px). Fixed height for Input/Text fields and default Chips (md).

lg.$description: (48px). Fixed height for Large Buttons, Input/Text fields, and other large component variants (lg).

xl.$description: (72px). Height for xl icon buttons and chips.

xs.$description: (16px). Height for the smallest icon size (Small Button).

sm.$description: (20px). Height for the icon in a Large Button.

md.$description: (24px). Default size for most standalone icons and instances in icon buttons.

lg.$description: (32px). Default size for most standalone icons and instances in icon buttons.

2xl.$description: (64px). Default size for most standalone icons and instances in icon buttons.

4xl.$description: (80px). Max height of a highlighted icon (e.g. a more detailed icon of a feature of benefit on a landing page).

button-mw-sm.$description: (96px). Ensures small buttons have adequate clickable area and visual presence.

button-mw-lg.$description: (128px). Ensures large buttons have substantial clickable area and prominent visual hierarchy.
